2.2 File encoding: UTF-8:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='FileTabCharacter'>
            <property name='eachLineIndentation' value='true'/>
        </module>",
        "<module name='FileLength'>
            <property name='max' value='2000'/>
            <property name='min' value='0'/>
        </module>"
    ]
}
2.3.1 Whitespace characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
  <property name='allowEmptyMethods' value='false'/>
  <property name='allowEmptyTypes' value='false'/>
  <property name='tokens' value='ASSIGN,BAND,BAND_ASSIGN,BOR,BOR_ASSIGN,BSR,BSR_ASSIGN,BXOR,BXOR_ASSIGN,DIV,DIV_ASSIGN,EQUAL,GE,GT,LAND,LCURLY,LE,LITERAL_ASSERT,LITERAL_CATCH,LITERAL_DO,LITERAL_ELSE,LITERAL_FINALLY,LITERAL_FOR,LITERAL_IF,LITERAL_RETURN,LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED,LITERAL_TRY,LITERAL_WHILE,LOR,LT,MINUS,MINUS_ASSIGN,MOD,MOD_ASSIGN,NOT_EQUAL,PLUS,PLUS_ASSIGN,QUESTION,RCURLY,SL,SLIST,SL_ASSIGN,SR,SR_ASSIGN,STAR,STAR_ASSIGN,TYPE_EXTENSION_AND ,TYPE_EXTENSION_AND_EQUAL,TYPE_EXTENSION_OR,TYPE_EXTENSION_OR_EQUAL,TYPE_EXTENSION_XOR,TYPE_EXTENSION_XOR_EQUAL,TYPE_EXTENSION_ARROW,TYPE_EXTENSION_ARROW_ASSIGN,TYPE_EXTENSION_SL,TYPE_EXTENSION_SL_ASSIGN,TYPE_EXTENSION_SR,TYPE_EXTENSION_SR_ASSIGN,TYPE_EXTENSION_STAR,TYPE_EXTENSION_STAR_ASSIGN,TYPE_EXTENSION_PLUS,TYPE_EXTENSION_PLUS_ASSIGN,TYPE_EXTENSION_MINUS,TYPE_EXTENSION_MINUS_ASSIGN,TYPE_EXTENSION_TILDE,TYPE_EXTENSION_BANG,UNARY_MINUS,UNARY_PLUS'/>
  <property name='tokensExclusion' value='ANNOTATION'/>
</module>"
    ]
}
2.3.2 Special escape sequences:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='Regexp'>
  <property name='format' value='\\b'/>
  <property name='illegalPattern' value='\\\\[0-7]{1,3}'/>
  <property name='illegalPattern' value='\\\\u[0-9a-fA-F]{4}'/>
  <property name='message' value='Use special escape sequences instead of octal or Unicode escapes.'/>
  <property name='minimum' value='1'/>
</module>"
    ]
}
2.3.3 Non-ASCII characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='RegexpSinglelineJava'>
  <property name='format' value='[^\p{ASCII}]'/>
  <property name='message' value='Avoid non-ASCII characters in source code.'/>
  <property name='illegalPattern' value='true'/>
  <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
  <property name='ignoreStrings' value='true'/>
</module>"
    ]
}

4 Formatting:
{

{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='Indentation'>
            <property name='basicOffset' value='2'/>
            <property name='caseIndent' value='2'/>
            <property name='throwsIndent' value='2'/>
            <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='2'/>
        </module>"
    ]
}
4.4 Column limit: 100:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='LineLength'>
            <property name='max' value='100'/>
            <property name='ignorePattern' value='^import\\s.+;$'/>
            <property name='ignorePattern' value='^package\\s.+;$'/>
            <property name='ignorePattern' value='^\\s*\\/\\/@SuppressWarnings.*$'/>
            <property name='ignorePattern' value='^\\s*\\/\\/@param\\s[^\\s]+\\s+[^\\s]+\\s.*$'/>
            <property name='ignorePattern' value='^\\s*\\/\\/@return\\s.*$'/>
            <property name='ignorePattern' value='^\\s*\\/\\/@throws\\s.*$'/>
            <property name='ignorePattern' value='^\\s*\\/\\/@exception\\s.*$'/>
            <property name='ignorePattern' value='^\\s*\\/\\/@see\\s.*$'/>
            <property name='ignorePattern' value='^\\s*\\/\\/@since\\s.*$'/>
            <property name='ignorePattern' value='^\\s*\\/\\/@version\\s.*$'/>
        </module>"
    ]
}
4.5.1 Where to break:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='OperatorWrap'>",
        "  <property name='allowNoLineWrap' value='false'/>",
        "  <property name='tokens' value='ASSIGN, BAND, BAND_ASSIGN, BOR, BOR_ASSIGN, BSR, BSR_ASSIGN, BXOR, BXOR_ASSIGN, COLON, DIV, DIV_ASSIGN, EQUAL, GE, GT, LAND, LE, LITERAL_ASSERT, LOR, LT, MINUS, MINUS_ASSIGN, MOD, MOD_ASSIGN, NOT_EQUAL, PLUS, PLUS_ASSIGN, QUESTION, SL, SLIST, SL_ASSIGN, SR, SR_ASSIGN, STAR, STAR_ASSIGN'/>",
        "</module>",
        "<module name='LineLength'>",
        "  <property name='max' value='120'/>",
        "  <property name='ignorePattern' value='^\\s*\\*\\s*@param\\s+[^\\s]+\\s+[^\\s]+\\s*$'/>",
        "</module>"
    ]
}

4.8.7 Modifiers:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='VisibilityModifier'>
  <property name='allowPublicStaticFinal' value='true'/>
  <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF,INTERFACE_DEF,ENUM_DEF,ANNOTATION_DEF,METHOD_DEF,CTOR_DEF,FIELD_DEF'/>
</module>",
        "<module name='ModifierOrder'>
  <property name='id' value='ModifiersOrder'/>
  <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF,INTERFACE_DEF,ENUM_DEF,ANNOTATION_DEF,METHOD_DEF,CTOR_DEF,FIELD_DEF,LOCAL_VARIABLE_DEF,PARAMETER_DEF'/>
  <property name='expected' value='public,protected,private,abstract,default,static,final,transient,volatile,synchronized,native,strictfp'/>
</module>"
    ]
}
5.1 Rules common to all identifiers:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='PackageName'>
  <property name='format' value='^[a-z]+(\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*)*$'/>
</module>",
        "<module name='TypeName'>
  <property name='format' value='[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*'/>
  <property name='allowclasseswithoutpackage' value='false'/>
</module>"
    ]
}
5.2.2 Class names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='TypeName'>
            <property name='format' value='^[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
            <property name='allowClassesWithoutPrefix' value='false'/>
            <property name='allowMemberClasses' value='false'/>
            <property name='allowInterfaces' value='true'/>
            <property name='allowEnums' value='false'/>
            <property name='allowAnnotationTypes' value='false'/>
            <property name='allowAnnotations' value='false'/>
        </module>",
        "<module name='MethodName'>
            <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
            <property name='allowConstructorName' value='false'/>
            <property name='allowStaticMethodNames' value='false'/>
            <property name='allowPublicMethodNames' value='false'/>
            <property name='allowProtectedMethodNames' value='false'/>
            <property name='allowPackageMethodNames' value='false'/>
            <property name='allowPrivateMethodNames' value='false'/>
            <property name='allowFinalMethodNames' value='false'/>
            <property name='allowNativeMethodNames' value='false'/>
            <property name='allowSynchronizedMethodNames' value='false'/>
            <property name='allowStrictfpMethodNames' value='false'/>
        </module>"
    ]
}

6.2 Caught exceptions: not ignored:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='EmptyCatchBlock'>
  <property name='severity' value='error'/>
  <property name='exceptionName' value='^((?!expected).)*$'/>
  <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_CATCH'/>
  <property name='allowCommentedBlocks' value='true'/>
</module>"
    ]
}
